meanings.definition: The quality or state of not being real; lack of reality.
meanings.sent1: The irreality of the dream made it hard to distinguish from waking life.
meanings.sent2: The movie created an irreality that transported the audience to a different world.
meanings.sent3: The irreality of the situation was so absurd that it felt like a comedy sketch.
meanings.sent4: His mind was clouded by an irreality that made it difficult to focus on actual events.
meanings.sent5: The irreality of the virtual reality game was so convincing that players felt truly immersed.
